page.title: 05Leisure and Recreation.(l)
page.content: There are not many facilities for leisure activites for either young or old people in this area with the exception of the Avon Soaring Centre and the Moyfield Riding School. The Avon Soaring Centre is a thriving Gliding Club in Bickmarsh which has been in existence since l964. Attracting visitors from all over the country especially now that Gliding competitions are held from this site. The site occupies a very small area approximately 500 metres by 50 metres which is sufficient for powered aeroplanes to tow gliders. This method of launching is the most efficient means of running a successful gliding club. In l985 the club has undergone rapid expansion and many local people are taking advantage of the facilities now available.
